params.name: agentId
params.doc: a unique identifier of the agent whose channel is being verified

params.name: channelId
params.doc: the id of the channel to be verified

params.name: code
params.doc: a 6-digit code to verify

docs.summary: check a verification code for a specific channel in order to complete the verification flow

params.name: agentId
params.doc: a unique identifier of the agent whose channel is being verified

params.name: channelId
params.doc: the id of the channel to be verified

params.name: code
params.doc: a 6-digit code to verify

docs.summary: check a verification code for a specific channel in order to complete the verification flow

params.name: agentId
params.doc: a unique identifier of the agent whose channel is being verified

params.name: channelId
params.doc: the id of the channel to be verified

params.name: text
params.doc: an optional verification text template with "[code]" placeholder

docs.summary: start a verification flow on the specified channel - the channel will receive a verification code which can the be checked in order to complete the verification.

body:
curl POST 'https://www.wixapis.com/virtual-numbers/v1/agents/12345678-e3ab-4a32-869a-f11234512345/channels/12345678-68bc-42bb-b719-f11234512345/verification' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -H 'Content-Type: text/plain' \
    -d '{
       "text": "Your verification code [code]"
   }'

params.name: agentId
params.doc: a unique identifier of the agent whose channel is being verified

params.name: channelId
params.doc: the id of the channel to be verified

params.name: text
params.doc: an optional verification text template with "[code]" placeholder

docs.summary: start a verification flow on the specified channel - the channel will receive a verification code which can the be checked in order to complete the verification.

body:
curl POST 'https://www.wixapis.com/virtual-numbers/v1/agents/12345678-e3ab-4a32-869a-f11234512345/channels/12345678-68bc-42bb-b719-f11234512345/verification' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -H 'Content-Type: text/plain' \
    -d '{
       "text": "Your verification code [code]"
   }'

docs.summary:
Returns a list of voicemail entities using `paging` parameter for specific pagination.
 `paging.limit` - denotes the page size to return, defaults to 25
 `paging.offset` - denotes the page offset for the request, defaults to 0

mute interval duration, in minutes.
 Minimal mute value is 30 minutes, maximal mute value is 1440 (24 hours)

docs.summary: send an SMS with deep-link into Wix application to the specified channel

body:
curl POST 'https://www.wixapis.com/virtual-numbers/v1/agents/12345678-e3ab-4a32-869a-f11234512345/channels/12345678-68bc-42bb-b719-f11234512345/send-app-link' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>'
    -H 'Content-Type: text/plain' \
    -d '{
      "textMessage": "Deeplink message prefix: "
    }'

params.name: agentId
params.doc: a unique identifier of the agent whose channel will receive the sms

params.name: channelId
params.doc: the id of the channel to receive the application link

params.name: textMessage
params.doc: an optional text message to which the actual link will be appended

docs.summary:
An Agent entity represents a User than can communicate using Business Number.
 When Agent is assigned to a Virtual Numbers account, inbound calls can be redirected
 to the Agent and the Agent can initiate outbound calls via the Business Number.

members.name: name
members.doc: Agent Name

members.name: revision
members.doc: The number of updates that were made on this entity. This field is required when updating in order to avoid conflicts.

members.name: id
members.doc: Agent Id

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc:
Agent Wix user Id. Taken implicitly from the context when an Agent is created.
 Used when the Agent initiating a call to extract caller phone number.
 In addition, for inbound calls, if the call is redirected to an Agent, this Id is
 used to notify the Agent about the incoming call with caller details.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Agent updated date

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Agent created date

docs.summary:
An AssignedAgent entity represent and assignment of an Agent Virtual Numbers Account.
This relation also contains information about the Availability of the Agent in this specific assignment
(i.e., an Agent can be available in different hours under different Virtual Numbers accounts)

members.name: agentId
members.doc: Agent Id

members.name: virtualNumberAccountId
members.doc: Virtual Numbers Account Id

members.name: availability
members.doc: Schedule object representing the availability of the Agent in the given Virtual Numbers account

members.name: revision
members.doc: The number of updates that were made on this entity. This field is required when updating in order to avoid conflicts.

members.name: mutedUntilDate
members.doc:
Optional Timestamp indicating an explicit unavailability of the agent. When set, its override any availability
 settings defined under the availability object.
 If this field is not null set to a value > current datetime, the Agent will not receive any incoming calls and
 if no other Agent is available, the call will be redirected into voicemail.

members.name: id
members.doc: Optional WixMedia ID

members.name: url
members.doc: URL of audio

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of the audio file, max size is 256 chars

members.name: duration
members.doc: audio duration

members.name: id
members.doc: WixMedia ID

members.name: url
members.doc: URL of transcription file

members.name: introduction
members.doc: introduction paragraph

body:
{
  "virtualNumberAccountId": "12345678-e00b-46a3-ab92-f11234512345",
  "sessionId": "12345678-16ec-3eb0-a0e5-bead6e4c4415",
  "startTime": "2020-05-26T06:13:40Z",
  "endTime": "2020-05-26T06:14:10Z",
  "businessNumber": "+12093xxxxxx",
  "from": "+15091xxxxxx",
  "to": "+15095xxxxxx",
  "contactId": "12345678-11af-41d6-a6c9-f11234512345",
  "status": "VOICE_MAIL",
  "direction": "INBOUND_DIAL",
  "recording":   {
    "id": "XXXXXXXXXX",
    "url": "https://path/to/recording",
    "duration": 6
  },
  "transcription":   {
    "id": "XXXXXXXXXX",
    "url": "https://path/to/transcription",
    "introduction": "Hey, just leaving here a message, please call back when possible."
  },
  "callId": "XXXXXXXXXX"
}

members.name: duration
members.doc: The duration in seconds of a completed call

members.name: agentId
members.doc: The agent id of the agent participating in the call

members.name: startTime
members.doc: The start time of the call

members.name: businessNumber
members.doc: The business number associated with the call

members.name: virtualNumberAccountId
members.doc: The id of the virtual number account associated to the call record

members.name: direction
members.doc: The direction of the call

members.name: to
members.doc: The phone number of the recipient of the call

members.name: endTime
members.doc: The end time of the call

members.name: status
members.doc: The reported status of the call

members.name: sessionId
members.doc: The unique session identifier of the call

members.name: contactId
members.doc: The optional contact id of the user-of-user who participated in the call

members.name: from
members.doc: The phone number from which the call was made

members.name: callId
members.doc: The unique call identifier issued by the Telco provider

members.name: transcription
members.doc: The optional reference to the transcription of the call

members.name: recording
members.doc: The optional reference to the audio recording of the call

members.name: externalId
members.doc: The optional external reference id. Available for outbound sms

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: The timestamp of the sms record

members.name: smsId
members.doc: The sms identifier issued by the Telco provider

members.name: businessNumber
members.doc: The business number associated with the sms record

members.name: virtualNumberAccountId
members.doc: The id of the virtual number account associated to the sms record

members.name: uouNumber
members.doc: The phone number of the user-of-user associated with the sms

members.name: direction
members.doc: The direction of the sms

members.name: status
members.doc: The reported status of the sms

members.name: sessionId
members.doc: The unique session identifier of the sms message

members.name: contactId
members.doc: The optional contact id of the user-of-user associated with the sms

members.name: numSegments
members.doc: The optional number of segments required by the carrier to sent the sms

members.name: count
members.doc: the number of returned records

members.name: offset
members.doc: the offset of current request

members.name: total
members.doc: the total count of found records

docs.summary: an entity representing a business number

members.name: capabilities
members.doc: the business number capabilities (i.e., sms, mms, voice etc')

members.name: friendlyName
members.doc: a display name for the business number

members.name: canonicalNumber
members.doc: the phone number in E.164 format (libphonenumber)

members.name: revision
members.doc: The number of updates that were made on this entity. This field is required when updating in order to avoid conflicts.

members.name: id
members.doc: a unique identifier of a business number

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: ISO-3166-1 country code

members.name: type
members.doc: phone number type (i.e., local, toll_free, mobile etc')

docs.summary:
Set of Boolean properties that indicate whether a phone number can receive calls or messages.
 Supported capabilities are: Voice, SMS, and MMS.

members.name: text
members.doc: Text of message

members.name: voiceGender
members.doc: Voice gender of the speech

members.name: language
members.doc: Language of the text, ISO 639-1 language codes. Supported values: en, en-gb, es, fr, de, it

members.name: revision
members.doc: The number of updates that were made on this entity. This field is required when updating in order to avoid conflicts.

members.name: id
members.doc: Voicemail Id

docs.summary:
An entity representing Account - which is the root entity and the context for every activity related to a virtual number.
 The account entity holds the business number, along with all the user preferences that relate to that number.

members.name: businessNumber
members.doc: the business number related to the account

members.name: voicemail
members.doc: the voicemail message that will be played for a person calling the business-number when there's no answer.

members.name: agents
members.doc: a list of all the agents which are assigned to this account and are able to make / receive calls through the business number

members.name: info
members.doc: the details of the account

docs.summary: An entity representing AccountInfo - which holds the details of the account

members.name: accountSettings
members.doc: user preferences related to the account

members.name: name
members.doc: the display name of the account

members.name: statusUpdatedDate
members.doc: the last update date of the account status

members.name: revision
members.doc:
The number of updates that were made on this entity. This field is required when updating in order to avoid conflicts.
    repeated VoicemailSchedule voicemail_schedules      = 9;

members.name: id
members.doc: a unique identifier of the account

members.name: status
members.doc: the status of the account

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: the last update date of the account

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: the creation date of the account

docs.summary: an entity representing user preferences related to the account.

members.name: ringingDuration
members.doc: indicates the duration (in seconds) of ringing sound that the caller will hear before being redirected to voicemail

members.name: voicemailNotification
members.doc: indicates if voicemail notification is enabled for this account. Default: ENABLED

members.name: voicemail
members.doc: indicates if voicemail is enabled for this account. Default: ENABLED

members.name: transcription
members.doc: indicates if call transcription is enabled for this account. Default: DISABLED

members.name: callerId
members.doc: indicates which number to show for inbound calls. Default: BUSINESS_NUMBER

members.name: record
members.doc: indicates if call recording is enabled for this account. Default: DISABLED

docs.summary: an entity representing the voicemail message that will be played for the account

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of named projections. E.g. "basic" will return id and name fields. Specifying multiple fieldsets will return the union of fields from all. Specifying fieldsets and fields will also return the union of fields.

members.name: filter
members.doc: A filter object. See documentation [here](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rnd/platformization-guidelines/api-query-language#platformization-guidelines_api-query-language_defining-in-protobuf)

members.name: paging

members.name: fields
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of specific field names to return. If fieldsets are also specified, return the union of fieldsets and fields

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sort object in the form [{"fieldName":"sortField1"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","direction":"DESC"}]

members.doc:
mute interval duration, in minutes.
 Minimal mute value is 30 minutes, maximal mute value is 1440 (24 hours)

members.name: mutedUntilDate
members.doc: the expiration time for the mute state, after which the agent will automatically be unmute.

members.name: virtualNumberAccountId
members.doc: the id of the virtual number entity to which the agent is assigned

members.name: agentId
members.doc: the id of the agent that is leaving the mute state

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • SUNDAY
  • MONDAY
  • TUESDAY
  • WEDNESDAY
  • THURSDAY
  • FRIDAY
  • SATURDAY

an enum representing the possible statues of a channel Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • PENDING
  • VERIFIED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_CALL_STATUS
  • ONGOING
  • COMPLETED
  • FAILED
  • BUSY_OR_NO_ANSWER
  • CANCELED
  • STARTED
  • VOICE_MAIL

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_DIRECTION
  • INBOUND_API
  • OUTBOUND_API
  • INBOUND_DIAL
  • OUTBOUND_DIAL

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_SMS_STATUS
  • SENT
  • RECEIVED
  • FAILED
  • DELIVERED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_DIRECTION
  • INBOUND
  • OUTBOUND

an enum representing the possible number types Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • LOCAL
  • TOLL_FREE
  • MOBILE

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_GENDER
  • MALE
  • FEMALE

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_USAGE
  • CALLS_INBOUND
  • CALLS_OUTBOUND
  • API_CALLS_INBOUND
  • API_CALLS_OUTBOUND
  • SMS_OUTBOUND
  • SMS_INBOUND
  • MMS_OUTBOUND
  • MMS_INBOUND

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_UNIT
  • CALLS
  • SMS
  • MMS
  • Minutes

an enum representing the possible states of an account Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • ACTIVE
  • PENDING
  • SUSPENDED

an enum representing the possible caller-ids for presenting on inbound calls Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_ID
  • BUSINESS_NUMBER
  • CALLER_NUMBER

an enum representing the possible states for settings properties Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_STATE
  • DISABLED
  • ENABLED

`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC
